item.description:
OSDBC 2012 practice season will start Wednesday, April 25 from 6-8pm and Saturday, April 28 from 9-11am. We'll be practicing at the Mashapaug Pond 361 Reservoir Ave, Providence (behind the Ocean State Job Lot). We'll continue to practice on Wednseday nights and Saturday mornings throughout the season.

If you are curious about dragonboating and want to be part of an exciting and growing sport, this is a great time to get started. Come down to practice and we'll get you paddling like a pro in short time. We have all the equipment you need. If you have any questions before coming down please don't hesitate to ask.

We look forward to seeing you at practice.

OSDBC
item.how_to_find_us: Park behind the Ocean State Job Lot and walk down to the pavillion
item.name: Dragonboat Paddling Practice
